name: get_campaign_from_url
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool fomoapi.
Tool description: The #1 Social Proof API, Boost Your Conversions
API description: Fetches campaign data from the Fomo API based on a specified campaign ID and optional URL.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the campaign.

url.description: The URL to be included in the query. Defaults to 'gogofodo.com'.
